title: Apple maintains iPhone sales leadership in 4Q21 amid supply constraints that affected most smartphone companies
content:
According to a new report, after the first year of COVID-19, worldwide smartphone sales grew 6% in 2021. Apple saw a rise in market share as well as becoming the number-one vendor of smartphones to end users in 4Q21.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple maintains iPhone sales leadership in 4Q21 amid supply constraints that affected most smartphone companies appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Gartner report shows Apple saw a rise in market share in 2021 as well as becoming the number-one vendor of smartphones to end users in 4Q21.
